featured.text: A player of Mills had possession of the ball, and Deborah ran to guard against her.
They were prized possessions made of expensive materials intended to impress guests.
Many have been helped through the scheme, including single parents, disabled people and the elderly, and those who have lost all their household possessions through a disaster such as a house fire.

definition.zh_def: 擁有或控制某物的狀態或行為。
definition.en_def: The state of having, owning, or controlling something.
definition.example: The possession of valuable items can attract unwanted attention.
